name: Into the Wild (DicPic Studio)
description:
Welcome to
Into the Wild by DicPic Studio!
Your safe haven, where we try to make the world a bit better by sharing love, peace, weird jokes and also... you know what.
You are playing as an explorer, who found himself on an unknown island. There he finds the whole new world with ancient ruins, traps, wild jungles and we are not here for that, lol.
Currently we have 6 girls (2 in the first episode and 4 in the second) and more to come. Each girl has unique character, quests, dressing sets and fetishes which gonna open during the whole game. Also there will be a lot of minor quests and enemies, so much more girls and hot content.
If you are interested in progress updates, polls, previews and extra content
definitely you should visit Our Patreon.
